column1: The Virginia Department of Forestry is very interested
in helping you get the most out of your timber
harvest and in helping you to ensure that the quality
of Virginia’s water is the best it can be. And, these
two goals don’t have to be mutually exclusive! By
following the tips in this pamphlet, you’ll be well
on your way to a successful, profitable
and legal harvest.
